name: @support-staging/slack-webhook
description: Slack webhook integration for support session notifications

scripts.test: echo 'Testing Slack integration...' && node scripts/slack-notifier.js $(find ../platforms -name 'session-logs' -type d | head -1)/$(ls $(find ../platforms -name 'session-logs' -type d | head -1) | tail -1)
scripts.validate-config: node -e "const SlackNotifier = require('./scripts/slack-notifier'); const notifier = new SlackNotifier(); console.log('Webhook configured:', notifier.isEnabled() ? 'Yes ‚úÖ' : 'No ‚ùå'); if (!notifier.isEnabled()) { console.log('üí° Set SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL or edit slack-config.json'); }"
scripts.test-full: echo 'Testing full session summary to Slack...' && node scripts/slack-notifier.js $(find ../platforms -name 'session-logs' -type d | head -1)/$(ls $(find ../platforms -name 'session-logs' -type d | head -1) | tail -1)
scripts.cleanup-help: echo 'Slack Cleanup Help:' && echo '' && echo '1. Create bot token at https://api.slack.com/apps' && echo '2. Add scopes: chat:write, channels:history, groups:history' && echo '3. Install bot to workspace' && echo '4. Add bot to channel: /invite @YourBotName' && echo '5. Get channel ID from channel URL' && echo '' && echo 'Usage:' && echo 'SLACK_BOT_TOKEN=xoxb-token SLACK_CHANNEL_ID=C123 npm run cleanup-duplicates-dry'

author: Beam Live Support Team

workspace.name: slack-webhook
workspace.description: Slack webhook integration for cross-platform session notifications
